statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_type, location, timestamp FROM sensor_data
SELECT id, sensor_type, data FROM sensor_data WHERE location='Room A'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Humidity' AND data->>'humidity_value' > '50'
SELECT id, sensor_type, timestamp, location, data FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A'
SELECT AVG(data->>'temperature') AS avg_temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING total_records > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM motion_detector_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM motion_detector_data WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT camera_location FROM camera_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM motion_detector_data WHERE motion_detected = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM camera_data WHERE motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY camera_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM motion_detector_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM motion_detector_data WHERE motion_detected = TRUE GROUP BY sensor_id, sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM motion_detector_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Motion%' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, sensor_id FROM motion_detector_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING count > 5;
SELECT camera_location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM camera_data WHERE motion_detected = TRUE GROUP BY camera_location ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM MotionDetectors
SELECT id, status, location FROM MotionDetectors
SELECT location FROM Cameras WHERE brand = 'Sony'
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, reading FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 10
SELECT id, location, status FROM MotionDetectors
SELECT location, brand, resolution FROM Cameras
SELECT id, reading, timestamp FROM SensorData
SELECT brand, location, resolution FROM Cameras
SELECT id, status, location FROM MotionDetectors
SELECT * FROM motion_detectors;
SELECT id, location FROM motion_detectors WHERE motion_status = TRUE;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, image_url FROM camera_data WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM motion_detectors WHERE motion_status = TRUE;
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM motion_detectors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM motion_detectors WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND motion_status = FALSE;
SELECT MAX(reading) AS max_reading, MIN(reading) AS min_reading FROM sensor_data;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM motion_detectors ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM motion_detectors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM motion_detectors WHERE location = 'Hallway';
SELECT camera_id, camera_type FROM cameras ORDER BY camera_type DESC;
SELECT entry_id, data_type, data_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM video_recordings WHERE camera_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM motion_detectors ORDER BY location DESC, motion_detected ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM motion_detectors WHERE sensor_id > 5 AND location = 'Hallway'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_type LIKE '%temperature%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31'
SELECT camera_id, location, camera_type FROM cameras WHERE camera_type = 'PTZ' OR camera_type = 'Fixed'
SELECT recording_id, camera_id, start_time, end_time FROM video_recordings ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5
